game

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Object
      • game.Spaceship

  • public class Spaceship
extends Object
    Represents a spaceship sprite and stores various values relating to the spaceship and features methods to control the spaceship.
    Author:
    Michael Pu

                 double burnRatePerSecond)
        Parameters:
        mass - Mass of spaceship in kilograms
        velocity - Starting velocity
        position - Starting position
        image - Image of spaceship
        engineThrust - Thrust produced by engine in newtons
        fuelTimeLeft - Amount of burn time in seconds
        burnRatePerSecond - Kilograms of fuel burned per second
